author: Matt Larkin
description:
In 2023, Hexworks launched a new game called Lords of the Fallen. Technically a sequel to the 2015 game of the same name, this Lords of the Fallen also acted as a kind of reboot since the first one never hit its stride. Sadly, this second attempt also met mixed reviews … initially. With the 2025 update known […]

The post REVIEW: Lords of the Fallen appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: REVIEW: Lords of the Fallen
